name: customer-support-pack
description: Skills for ticket triage, response templates, escalation workflows, and customer communication
author: CoWork-OSS

skills.name: Ticket Triage
skills.description: Analyze and categorize a support ticket with priority, category, and suggested response
skills.prompt:
Triage the following support ticket.

Ticket content:
{{ticket}}

Please provide:
1. Priority level (P1-Critical, P2-High, P3-Medium, P4-Low)
2. Category (Bug, Feature Request, How-To, Billing, Account, Other)
3. Sentiment analysis (Frustrated, Neutral, Positive)
4. Key issue summary (1-2 sentences)
5. Suggested initial response
6. Recommended escalation path (if needed)

parameters.name: ticket
parameters.description: The support ticket content to triage

skills.name: Response Draft
skills.description: Draft a support response using the appropriate tone and including resolution steps
skills.prompt:
Draft a support response for the following customer issue.

Customer message: {{message}}
Context/Resolution: {{resolution}}

Guidelines:
- Be empathetic and acknowledge their frustration
- Provide clear step-by-step instructions
- Use simple language (avoid jargon)
- Include relevant links or documentation references
- End with an offer for further assistance

skills.name: Escalation Summary
skills.description: Create a structured escalation summary for engineering or management
skills.prompt:
Create an escalation summary for the following support issue.

Issue details:
{{issue}}

Please format as:
1. Issue Summary (2-3 sentences)
2. Customer Impact (severity, number of affected users)
3. Steps Already Taken
4. Root Cause Hypothesis
5. Recommended Next Steps
6. Timeline Expectations

skills.name: KB Article Draft
skills.description: Draft a knowledge base article from a resolved support case
skills.prompt:
Create a knowledge base article based on the following resolved support case.

Resolved case:
{{case_details}}

Article format:
1. Title (clear, searchable)
2. Problem Description
3. Symptoms
4. Solution (step-by-step)
5. Additional Notes
6. Related Articles (suggest topics)

parameters.name: case_details
parameters.description: Details of the resolved support case

agentRoles.name: support-specialist
agentRoles.description: Specializes in customer support workflows, ticket triage, and knowledge base management
agentRoles.systemPrompt: You are a Customer Support Specialist agent. You excel at triaging tickets, drafting empathetic responses, creating escalation summaries, and maintaining knowledge base articles. You prioritize customer satisfaction and clear communication.
